UniprotID	Q14872
Accession	Q14872;B2RAK6;Q96CB1
EntryName	MTF1_HUMAN
ProteinName	Metal regulatory transcription factor 1 (MRE-binding transcription factor) (Transcription factor MTF-1)
GeneName	MTF1
Length	753
Function	Zinc-dependent transcriptional regulator of cellular adaption to conditions of exposure to heavy metals (PubMed:8065932). Binds to metal responsive elements (MRE) in promoters and activates the transcription of metallothionein genes like metallothionein-2/MT2A (PubMed:8065932). Also regulates the expression of metalloproteases in response to intracellular zinc and functions as a catabolic regulator of cartilages (By similarity).
Subcellular Location	Nucleus; Cytoplasm
